mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM aixu_meeting t
AND (t.STA_TIME >= #{params.staTime} AND t.END_TIME <= #{params.endTime}) OR (t.STA_TIME <= #{params.staTime} AND t.END_TIME >= #{params.endTime}) OR (t.STA_TIME > #{params.staTime} AND t.STA_TIME < #{params.endTime}) OR (t.END_TIME > #{params.staTime} AND t.END_TIME < #{params.endTime})
